name: Umoja yBTC
description: Umoja is an asset creation protocol that provides effortless, low-risk, high-yield crypto for everyone. Traditional assets, including all crypto, fiat currencies, and otherwise, cannot self-manage risks or yields. If the market takes a turn for the worse, so does the asset's value. Even during bull-runs, such assets are unable to optimize their own returns, leaving retail investors at a massive disadvantage in contrast to their whale and institutional investor counterparts, who leverage asset managers and automated trading strategies to get ahead. In contrast, Smartcoins are AI-driven, equipped with quant & DeFi-native trading strategies that proactively enhance holder returns.
